name: Yacy search server experiments
tagline: Work in progress on YaCy Search Engine application
body:
## YaCy experiments

### Simplify YaCy first launch
This is an attempt to simplify YaCy first launch. Indeed YaCy main website (http://yacy.net) currently only provide following deployment options :
 - Windows installer
 - Debian package
 - Mac Os application
 - Cross-platform tar.gz archive with .bat and .sh launch scripts
 - Cross-platform sources to compile

I think some other packaging options could be useful and may help newcomers to try YaCy. 
 - Self-contained portable application (with embedded jre)
 - Cross-platform :
  - Runnable jar
  - Java Web Start link
  - Browser applet
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
